name: Minfight
description:
This game has been made in 2 weeks for the LOWREZJAM 2021.

In Minfight you play as one of three different pet animals fighting for the title of the strongest "Minibeast". Fight your way through 4 levels in the Arcade mode or play competitive matches against your friends or the CPU in Versus mode.

Controls

!!! NOTE !!!

Gamepads might behave a bit weird if they are connected while the game is already running. Make sure all your gamepads are connected before launching the game.

Keyboard & MouseGamepad (XBox)In Menu:
  • WASD: Navigate
  • Space: Confirm
  • Esc: Back
  • O: Add bot (in Versus)
  • P: Remove bot (in Versus)

In Game:

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift (Hold): Sprint
  • Q: Shield/Parry
  • Left MB: Light Attack
  • W + Left MB: Upwards Attack
  • S + Left MB: Downwards Attack
  • Right MB: Heavy Attack
  • Shift + Right MB: Kick
In Menu:
  • Analog Stick: Navigate
  • A: Confirm
  • B: Back
  • X: Add bot (in Versus)
  • Y: Remove bot (in Versus)

In Game:

  • Analog Stick: Move
  • A/B: Jump
  • LT/RT: Sprint
  • LB/RB: Shield/Parry
  • X: Light Attack
  • Up + X: Upwards Attack
  • Down + X: Downwards Attack
  • Y: Heavy Attack
  • LT/RT + Y: Kick
